title: These beautiful fonts, help me identify them.
content:
Fellow font junkies! Help me out here, i want to know the font of TIFFANY + BRANDON and the date 03.31.12.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804171420im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-27%20at%2010.48.53%20PM.png)

I know you guys know this :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-27 at 10.48.53 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804171420/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-27%20at%2010.48.53%20PM.png) | 587.84 KB |
author: dandanthedan

comments.content:
oh! i just found out the Brandon + Tiffany is Wisdom Script.

Now i just need to know that beautiful font for the date.
wow! thank you so much Ryuk! :)
